name: Runa (itch)
description:
Runa is an adventure game where the goal is to bring back light to a dark arcade TV-game world. Collect all the suns before time runs out. Use your magic to crush stones, walk on water, shoot fire bolts, and for protection against all evil.

The first rune is the symbol for trolls and great power. The second rune is the symbol for water, magic and traveling. The third rune protects against evil, and may be a symbol of the elk. The forth rune represents a juniper and death. The fifth rune symbolizes the sun, lightning and victory!

Controls: I,J,K,L (running direction), F (fire) and Q (restart)

The game is based on the template  game Timebomb Scroll by Rex van der Spuy.

Submitted to the Summer Slow Jams August 2019: Edutainment Games.
